timeline.bodyText:
Typo.
I personally think this should be either handleTextClick or onTextClicked.
timeline.author: Pyrofab
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -67,7 +67,8 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_437 net/minecraft/client/gui/screen/Screen
 	METHOD method_25428 confirmLink (Z)V
 		ARG 1 open
 	METHOD method_25429 addChild (Lnet/minecraft/class_364;)Lnet/minecraft/class_364;
-	METHOD method_25430 handleComponentClicked (Lnet/minecraft/class_2561;)Z
+	METHOD method_25430 handlTextClicked (Lnet/minecraft/class_2561;)Z

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we could clarify this to drawHorizontalLine ?

timeline.bodyText: This definitely needs to be renamed, though maybe in another pr.

replies.bodyText: I am not sure how I can rename this, there are just too many blits, probably with another pr. my suggestion would be drawTexture because I can't think of better names.
replies.author: shedaniel

replies.bodyText: I might just rename blitOffset to zLevel for now to be consistent to ItemRenderer?
replies.author: shedaniel
